data.strFullDescription:
歡迎遊玩《Islands of Insight》。這是一款絕美的共享世界解謎遊戲，設定在古老奇蹟和美麗自然的奇幻世界中。這裡充滿了等待你解開的神祕謎題、等待你發掘的祕密，以及等待你探索的豐富風景。這片漂浮島嶼的寧靜世界是放鬆心情的理想之地，以自己的步調展開一場由你選擇的解謎冒險吧。 

[img width="616" height="56"]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/2071500/extras/90209a496583971a10982de965d80571.webp?t=1730308751[/img]
尋找並解開超過一萬道獨特的謎題，涵蓋 24 種不同的謎題類型。世界的每一個角落都隱藏著等待你發現的新奇時刻。無論是透視謎題、邏輯問題或環境挑戰，你將會遇到難度各異的謎題。這些謎題都是由最優秀的解謎設計師製作，為解謎粉絲的新手和老手創造引人入勝的體驗。   


[imgvid poster.avif="https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/2071500/extras/12c9cf19e7c2a5ef3f926807f061fb4b.poster.avif?t=1730308751" webm="https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/2071500/extras/12c9cf19e7c2a5ef3f926807f061fb4b.webm?t=1730308751" webp="https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/2071500/extras/12c9cf19e7c2a5ef3f926807f061fb4b.webp?t=1730308751" width="616" height="308"][/imgvid]

[img width="616" height="56"]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/2071500/extras/9c43005636ae6e78db4c0b0b7479cda3.webp?t=1730308751[/img]
自由探索主島的廣闊開放世界，大部分的謎題和祕密都藏在其中。漫遊於五個獨特的生態群落和充滿活力的風景和建築，甚至在它們上空展翅滑翔。垂直探索環境，將你的遊戲提升到新的高度。透過完成 20 個以上的精選謎題，解鎖全新的謎題類型和區域。去你想去的地方，解你想解的謎題，你走的路就是唯一的路。  


[imgvid poster.avif="https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/2071500/extras/a06d53b934c66de627568405a75b9a48.poster.avif?t=1730308751" webm="https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/2071500/extras/a06d53b934c66de627568405a75b9a48.webm?t=1730308751" webp="https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/2071500/extras/a06d53b934c66de627568405a75b9a48.webp?t=1730308751" width="616" height="308"][/imgvid]

[img width="616" height="56"]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/2071500/extras/bd6b075dc67f3deb1b78fcd065ced78e.webp?t=1730308751[/img]
扮演追尋者展開充滿探索與解謎的和平旅程。踏上發現之路，讓好奇心帶著你漫遊無比驚艷的開放世界。在這裡，答案往往就近在眼前。 


[imgvid poster.avif="https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/2071500/extras/482f06382d4319148298e8c08bdee3d4.poster.avif?t=1730308751" webm="https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/2071500/extras/482f06382d4319148298e8c08bdee3d4.webm?t=1730308751" webp="https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/2071500/extras/482f06382d4319148298e8c08bdee3d4.webp?t=1730308751" width="616" height="308"][/imgvid]

[img width="616" height="56"]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/2071500/extras/35ed50f7df663cff123628049d243b7e.webp?t=1730308751[/img]
自訂你的角色，提升你的解謎技能，同時賺取火花來解鎖新的能力。完成每日任務，在我們的共享世界中和其他玩家無縫互動，彼此指導或靠自己解決問題。謎題會隨時間更新，每次造訪島嶼都會為你帶來新的發現。


[imgvid poster.avif="https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/2071500/extras/96ccca64cc7ef734c34f3738797e766b.poster.avif?t=1730308751" webm="https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/2071500/extras/96ccca64cc7ef734c34f3738797e766b.webm?t=1730308751" webp="https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/2071500/extras/96ccca64cc7ef734c34f3738797e766b.webp?t=1730308751" width="616" height="308"][/imgvid]

這款遊戲可能會有年齡限制。
data.strSnippet: 《Islands of Insight》是一款在絕美的共享世界展開的解謎遊戲。玩家將扮演追尋者，踏上探索與發現的和平之旅。用自己的步調探索壯麗的浮島世界，尋找並解開超過一萬道謎題，享受無窮無盡的遊玩時數。
